spec.name: Excelsior Palace Hotel
spec.description:
🔻 Architect: Hippolyte-Joseph Delaporte
🔻 Dates: 1914-1916
🔻 Current Status: Hotel
🔻 National Material Patrimony Declaration: 2003
🔻 Description: This was the first modern building built outside of the Medina walls. Although built using reinforced concrete, it uses Moroccan element for its decoration and interior design.
